text: Ara tara ubhaye daure darajara dike gela ebam strilokati pichana hate tara jama chimre phelala, ara tara du’jana strilokatira sbamike darajara kache pela. Strilokati balala, ‘ye tomara paribarera sathe manda kaja karara iccha kare tara jan'ya karagare prerana ba an'ya kono yantranadayaka sasti chara ara ki danda hate pare?’
